name: Need for Time
description:
Need for Time is a racing game where you have to dodge cars and collect gas. You can slow down time to squeeze through small gaps. Crash to much and you die!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

How to Play:

Use the A and D key to move back and forth. Use the space bar to slow down time(warning: when you slow down time you speed up)

Collect Gas to keep driving, slowing down time takes gas faster too!

Don't hit any cars, you have 3 lives!

Good luck!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game was for the Mini Jam 112 - chrono 

Hope you enjoy!
